channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Studentalkz

item.title: 日本旅行 1：事前准备
item.description:
本篇文章是 2025 年 8 月在日本 (大阪—奈良—京都—东京) 的 11 天旅行计划的第 1 部分，在此存档，也希望能对读者的旅行规划起到一点帮助。

本文还在更新中！后续会补充关于交通和一些活动的内容。

item.title: About me
item.description:
Hi! I’m Alex “aLexe1n” Liu and you can call me Alex. Welcome to Studentalkz!

What is this place?

Studentalkz is my blog and a personal space to record all my notes and thoughts online. I believe the Internet is built for communicating, sharing and mutual inspiring. I would like to post some life recording, meaningful writing and useful resorces with the public to approach this goal.

$$\alpha = \beta$$
